Why choose us?

Painless maintenance and easy scale-up

We use modular, inheritable scalable IoT architecture that provides for painless application maintenance, fast vertical and horizontal scale-up and allows adding new functional modules and expanding the existing functionality to new device models with reasonable effort.

Short time to market

We develop IoT applications relying on an iterative approach. This allows you to obtain a minimum viable product or a first application version with a learn set of high-priority features within 3-6 months and release new features every 2-4 weeks.

Mature quality assurance

We place a premium on applications’ quality from the very start of the project and focus on prevention and early detection of defects.

High level security

We place a premium on applications’ quality from the very start of the project and focus on prevention and early detection of defects.
